title: Why cant we mute this yet?
body:
For 20 minutes straight, every cooldown of their ping timer. "Yasuo signals enemies are missing" on either your dead body or his or anything really. 

Either add a report category for ping abuse, or let players choose between text mute and/or ping mute on a per player basis. Just like text chat can be both helpful to teamwork or abused, so can pings. 

There is no reason I shouldn't be able to _completely_ remove communication with this yasuo after he figured out the team all muted him.

Additionally, there could be further ping restrictions in the game. Such as this: every time you hit the max allowable pings, the timer before you can ping again grows quickly until it basically mutes you (current timer -> 1 min -> 5 min -> 15 min)
